title: Baked Alaska with sautéed apples
description: Make the most of seasonal apples with James' baked Alaksa, the perfect retro dessert for impressing at a dinner party. For this recipe you will need a sugar thermometer, chef's blowtorch and a freestanding mixer or electric whisk.
ingredients: 2 Bramley apples, peeled, cored, thinly sliced
1 x 500g/1lb 2oz tub firm vanilla ice cream
